name: Octopus City Blues
blurb: The authentic Octopus City simulation for Windows, OS X and Linux. A surreal adventure game about everything and nothing.

rewards.reward: #1 OCTOFAN - Spend the EVENING with Firas Assaad, the legendary game designer behind this masterpiece. You'll have LUNCH WITH FIRAS and then PLAY A GAME OF MONOPOLY with him. (Travel to Kuwait, accommodation and lunch expenses not included)
CHEATER - Similar to the previous reward, but if you win in Monopoly then Firas will pay for lunch. (At the cheapest restaurant available)
TENTACLE CUTTER - You get the game as a digital DRM-free copy for Windows, OS X and Linux.  This version has a lot of tentacles, but not enough to impress your dad.

TESTER - You get the game, as well as early access to the demo and final version. You also get access to a private beta testing forum where you can communicate with the development team. We'll pretend to care about your opinion even though we don't.

GROUPIE - You get a digital copy of the soundtrack in addition to previous rewards. Octomusic was never approved for human consumption; we are not responsible for any hallucinogenic side effects that you might experience.

SR. TENTACLE CUTTER - You get access to a kickstarter-exclusive digital copy of the game. This version has over 10% more animated tentacles than the regular version. It also introduces a new area and quest, and some other content. Your dad will be impressed and you'll also get the all the previous rewards.

OCTOMANIAC - You receive your own digital copy of the Necronomicon, the official companion guide to Octopus City Blues. Includes over 60 page of hints, character and story information, development notes, spooky stories and exclusive art. In addition to the previous rewards.

OCTOBLOOD PAINTER - You receive a digital copy of the official Octopus City Blues art book, and all the previous rewards EXCEPT the Necronomicon guide book. The Tentacle Artist reward below includes both of them. Why someone would prefer tentacle art over beetle breeding tips is a mystery.

TENTACLE ARTIST - You receive a digital copy of the official Octopus City Blues art book in addition to the previous rewards. The art book includes concept and pixel art and more detailed drawings of tentacles and dung beetles than you've ever asked for.

USELESS NPC - In addition to the previous rewards, an NPC designed after you appears in the game. You even get to provide a 140 characters message for the NPC to say. (Must be appropriate for the game's world. Subject to our approval. Octopus puns are NOT allowed)

OCTOBLOOD JUNKIE - A physical copy of the game with all the previous reward. You also get a printed ink drawing by our artist. A perfect gift for old school hipsters who live in caves and buy physical books.

CAPITALIST - It's your chance to show the world how rich you are. A hidden portrait of you appears in the game. When the player interacts with it they receive money. You also get all the previous rewards.

PATRON - You get a physical tentacle sculpture and your choice of either a water color or ink painting signed by our artist. In addition to the previous rewards, you'll also get a small digital guide explaining how to take care of your pet tentacle.

HELPER - We appreciate even the smallest of pledges. You'll get a personal email from the people behind the game thanking you for your help. You may get the previous rewards if we're feeling generous.
